task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see that you're accessing this from the public website (is_public=true), which means you're not yet logged in as an employee.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini Coatings! I appreciate your interest as you prepare to join us.

However, information about our time tracking procedures and internal policies is part of our employee documentation and is only available to current employees through our internal systems.

Once you officially join and receive your employee credentials, you'll have full access to our internal wiki where time tracking guidelines and other company policies are documented.

In the meantime, if you have general questions about onboarding, please feel free to contact our HR department directly, and they'll be happy to assist you with any pre-employment inquiries.
